children.value:
Squatch.js is the Referral SaaSquatch javascript SDK and a one-stop shop to integrate a referral program into your website or web app.
It can show referral widgets on any website, track users, generate unique referral short links and referral codes, and more.

tags.title: param
tags.description: Configuration details
tags.name: config

tags.title: param
tags.description: The tenant alias connects to your account. Note: There are both *live* and *test* tenant aliases.
tags.name: config.tenant_alias

tags.title: example
tags.description: squatch.init({tenant_alias:'test_basbtabstq51v'});

children.value: The tenant alias connects to your account. Note: There are both

tags.title: example
tags.description:
squatch.init({tenant_alias:'test_basbtabstq51v'});
squatch.api.createUser({id:'123', accountId:'abc', firstName:'Tom'});

children.value: The WidgetApi class is a wrapper around the Widget Endpoints of the SaaSquatch REST API.

tags.title: param
tags.description: Config details
tags.name: config

tags.title: param
tags.description: The tenant to access
tags.name: config.tenantAlias

tags.title: param
tags.description:
The server domain.
   Useful if you want to use a proxy like {@link https://requestb.in/ RequestBin} or {@link https://runscope.com/ Runscope}.
tags.name: config.domain

tags.title: example
tags.description: var squatchApi = new squatch.WidgetApi({tenantAlias:'test_12b5bo1b25125'});
tags.caption: Browser example

tags.title: example
tags.description:
var WidgetApi = require('squatch-js').WidgetApi;
var squatchApi = new WidgetApi({tenantAlias:'test_12b5bo1b25125'});
tags.caption: Browserify/Webpack example

tags.title: example
tags.description:
import {WidgetApi} from 'squatch-js';
let squatchApi = new WidgetApi({tenantAlias:'test_12b5bo1b25125'});
tags.caption: Babel+Browserify/Webpack example
